channel.title: TimesOpen on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TimesOpen on Blog

item.title: Fast Forward Labs at the Science Fair
item.description: Last night was the New York Times’ Open Source Science Fair. It kicked off with a keynote speech by our own Hilary Mason. Photo by Chrys Wu:Â http://t.co/m7G7G3g1ih After a dinner meet-and-greet session, the attendees and exhibitors got down to business, showing off their open source software projects, science fair style. Fast Forward Labs was an exhibitor. Micha Gorelick impressed the crowd with our realtime stream analysis prototype, CliqueStream.
